projectGridLines.title: Capital Stress Testing Loss and PPNR Model Development
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The candidate is expected to work on model development data preparation for Loss

Forecasting models. Once the data preparation is complete, the expectation is to run multiple model

iterations to identify the champion model as per business and statistical requirements.

Skill sets: Python, SQL, Econometrics, Data Analytics

Traits expectation: Communication, analysis, documentation, and punctual behavior

Expected learning: Understanding the end-to-end process of Regulatory Account Level Model

Development

Specific courses required for project execution: Modeling Techniques, Intermediate Python

projectGridLines.title: Flash Reporting: Regression Analysis
projectGridLines.description:
Description: In this project, you will work with real data of our company and will use Alteryx to

perform regression analysis and identify the key drivers of credit card originations, payments, and

other metrics for each brand. You will create automated workflows that can generate intra-month

financials and trend reports for senior leaders. You will gain valuable skills in data analysis,

automation, and financial forecasting.

Skill sets: Regression competency, Financial Modeling, Database Intelligence & Advanced Excel

Traits expectation: Attention to detail, collaboration, communication

Expected learning: Alteryx, Regression analysis & Financial Reporting

Specific courses required for project execution: Alteryx certification, data, and business analysis

projectGridLines.title: Controllership Analyst
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Automation of Fixed asset process & reconciliation process, payment application to

consumer loans, various journal entries,

Skill sets: Accounting Skills: Understanding accounting principles, cost analysis, cash flow statement,

and familiarity with financial statement analysis and accounting programs are crucial.

Interpersonal Skills: Interacting with senior leaders, colleagues, presenting projects and collaboration

with teammates are also important.

Communication Skills: Effective written and oral communication is crucial. Financial analysts need to

convey complex information clearly to colleagues, Stakeholders, and management team.

Technical Skills: Be comfortable with accounting software, data analytics tools, and emerging

technologies like artificial intelligence, Alteryx, Dataiku, Micro strategy, Power BI, etc.

Traits expectation: Analytical: Financial analysts must analyze data from various sources, interpret

trends, and make informed decisions. Presentation Skills: Being able to present findings persuasively

is valuable for stakeholders’ meetings and reports. Critical Thinking: Evaluating the process efficient

opportunities and assessing risks demand critical thinking skills.

Expected learning: Analyst will get an exposure towards Balance Sheet analysis, automation of

reconciliation process, payment application to consumer loans, various journal entries, and basic

accounting reconciliations.

Specific courses required for project execution: Financial statement analysis, Excel based

modelling, accounting concepts

projectGridLines.title: Promo plan forecast
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Exploring a path to uploading sales and MDF forecast by promo plan option to Essbase

to enhance visibility into the forecast for Big Ticket Clients and drive efficiencies with reporting &

analysis

Skill sets: Hyperion Essbase, Advanced Excel, financial acumen, report building, documentation, and

formatting

Traits expectation: Self-starter, strong Excel skills, intellectual curiosity, problem-solving, procedural

documentation

Expected learning: Familiarizing with Bread Financial Data systems, learn quarterly forecast process

of contractual Merchant Discount Fees, building Reporting & Analysis

Specific courses required for project execution: Financial statement analysis, Excel based

modelling

projectGridLines.title: Deferred Loan Forecasting
projectGridLines.description:
Description: As a consumer lender, our company offers a large variety of promotional financing

options; these financing plans vary in duration, interest rates, and other terms. The behavior of our

borrowers varies widely, but is correlated with the macroeconomic environment, the terms of the loan,

and more. Emark on a groundbreaking, data-driven journey with this project! Gone are the days of


relying solely on historical trends and market intuition—help our business move into the realm of data

science-based forecasting; this innovative project will harness the power of statistical regression and

other science-based methods to develop predictive models that will replace our current trend-based

forecasting methods with data-informed forecasts accompanied by deep insights into the behavioral

patterns of our account holders.

Skill sets: Strong background in data science, statistics, and mathematics, Proficiency in data

analysis, data visualization, and data storytelling

Traits expectation: Attention to detail, collaboration, communication

Expected learning: Trend Analysis & Financial Reporting, Knowledge of consumer lending, credit

risk, and behavioral economics.

Specific courses required for project execution: Data science or analytics, Alteryx/Microstrategy
